verses.name: Genesis 21:30
verses.text: And he said, For these seven ewe lambs shalt thou take of my hand, that they may be a witness unto me, that I have digged this well.

verses.name: Genesis 21:31
verses.text: Wherefore he called that place Beer–sheba; because there they sware both of them.

verses.name: Genesis 21:32
verses.text: Thus they made a covenant at Beer–sheba: then Abimelech rose up, and Phichol the chief captain of his host, and they returned into the land of the Philistines.

verses.name: Genesis 21:33
verses.text: And Abraham planted a grove in Beer–sheba, and called there on the name of the Lord, the everlasting God.

verses.name: Genesis 21:34
verses.text: And Abraham sojourned in the Philistines’ land many days.
